The Inflation Reduction Act represents a historic climate investment, and it‚Äôs facing potential cuts from Republicans. 

We must staunchly resist such reductions, ensuring our communities have the resources to combat climate change and secure a sustainable future.

Standing in solidarity with UAW Local 868 and nationwide UAW strikers for fair wages, safer workplaces, and an end to pay disparities and forced overtime. SAG proved strikes work. Together, let's demand better working conditions and fair treatment. #UAWStrike #UAWSolidarity

Generations of Americans marched, fought, and died for the right to vote.
¬†
I‚Äôm proud to join @HouseDemocrats to introduce the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act, honoring our late colleague and¬†ensuring every American can vote in safe and secure elections. #JohnRLewisVRAA

Soccer is growing in Georgia! We give a warm welcome to U.S. Soccer's new headquarters in Atlanta. As a bedrock of sports, we're proud to have U.S. Soccer in our community and are excited for this aspiring, new partnership.

Every year, 350 children under the age of 18 unintentionally shoot themselves or someone else.

I signed the @HouseGVP discharge petition to urge House Republican leadership to vote on a safe storage bill to keep our children safe from unsecured firearms.

Happy #NationalInternDay to all the bright minds shaping our future! üåüü§ù

We extend heartfelt thanks to our #GA13 D.C. and District Office interns for their hard work and dedication in serving our community. Your contributions make a difference every day.

Today is #BlackWomensEqualPayDay, highlighting the harsh reality: Black women earn just 67¬¢ for every dollar compared to white men. It's time to fully support Black women in the workforce and end generational disparities.
Whether you're grilling, watching fireworks, or spending time with loved ones, I hope everyone in #GA13 and across the nation has a safe and joyous #IndependenceDay!

#StudentDebtRelief isn't just a desirable outcome‚Äîit‚Äôs a crucial investment for future generations.

Despite the recent SCOTUS ruling, I remain committed to empowering our students, allowing them to flourish without the weight of loans limiting their true potential.

Proud to stand with the 340,000 UPS @Teamsters who are taking a stand for fair wages, safe working conditions, affordable healthcare, and dignified retirement. UPS workers are essential and deserve their fair share.

June is #MensHealthMonth, a time to raise awareness about the health issues affecting men and boys. Let's continue working to foster open conversations about mental health and emphasize the importance of preventive care.

Today, we observe #Juneteenth, a celebration of America‚Äôs second Independence Day. As we reflect on the legacy of the last American slaves freed from bondage, let us reaffirm our commitment to freedom and justice for all.
Wishing all of the fathers and father figures in #GA13 and across the nation a #HappyFathersDay!
This #ImmigrantHeritageMonth, I am especially proud to celebrate the immigrant communities that enrich #GA13 and our nation!

Today, I am proud to introduce a resolution to recognize the thousands of local LGBTQ+ activists, community organizers, and families for their hard-fought victories, and recognize the work still necessary to guarantee equality for all.
Happy Pride to the LGBTQI+ community in #GA13 and across the country!

On this 79th anniversary of the Allied invasion of Normandy, we pay tribute to the resolute spirit and unwavering bravery of those who fearlessly fought for liberty and forged a path toward lasting peace.

May we forever honor the heroes of D-Day.

Happy #WorldEnvironmentDay!üåè

I remain committed to fostering a healthier environment and supporting equitable solutions that empower our communities.

Let's celebrate our planet and work together to protect its precious resources.

During National Gun Violence Awareness Month, let's unite to end the devastating impact of gun violence. Together, we can create safer communities and protect lives.
¬†
It's time to take decisive measures to #EndGunViolence.

This #MemorialDay, we honor the U.S. veterans who made the ultimate sacrifice for our freedom.

We cherish their enduring impact on our country and stand united with their families and loved ones.

Thanks and congratulations to all of the HS students and art teachers for their contributions to this year's #GA13 Congressional Art Competition! This showcase marks the 20th anniversary of the annual contest, and I continue to be astounded by our students' talent and creativity!

During today's @FSCDems hearing, I addressed former Silicon Valley Bank CEO Becker and underscored the fact that #SVB had the highest rate of uninsured deposits, a staggering 95%, among American banks with over $50B in assets.
This legislation ensures that Officer Edwards' commitment, determination, and heroic service in defense of American democracy are duly acknowledged.

I am proud to introduce a resolution recognizing U.S. Capitol Police Officer Caroline Edwards for her heroic actions during the January 6th assault on the U.S. Capitol.

congress.gov/bill/118th-cong‚Ä¶

Our veterans have earned the best quality of care available & should never be subjected to a lower standard than the general public, which is why I am glad to reintroduce the Protect Lifesaving Anesthesia Care for Veterans Act with my colleagues @RepMikeTurner and @RepGarbarino.

During #NationalLibraryWeek, let's celebrate the vital role of libraries in our communities!
¬†
Library workers provide American communities with essential comprehensive, accessible environments to learn, develop, and connect with others. Thank you for your service and commitment!

It is an honor to be recognized by @NatlJumpStart as a Federal Leader in Financial Literacy!

I thank the Jump$tart Coalition and its members for the work they do every day to ensure all Americans have access to financial tools and support.

Press Release: davidscott.house.gov/news/do‚Ä¶
Read More: davidscott.house.gov/news/do‚Ä¶

This week, I was proud to announce the reintroduction of H.R. 2475, the MAKERS Act, with @RepMarkTakano, @RepDrewFerguson & @RepBrianFitz. My bipartisan bill expands #STEM learning for MSI & HBCU students by improving access to innovative tools and valuable educational resources.
Wishing everyone who celebrates in #GA13 a joyous and blessed #Easter!
To all who celebrate in #GA13, I wish you and your family a Happy #Passover!
Learn more at cops.usdoj.gov/svpp.

The DOJ COPS grant funding opportunities for school violence prevention and community policing development can help ensure a safer environment for our students.
¬†
I encourage #GA13 school districts and law enforcement agencies to apply by May 17.

55 years ago today, we lost a hero.

May we honor and remember the life and legacy of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and continue to fight for justice, equality, and peace in his honor.

During #KidneyMonth, I stand with the @KidneyFund in the fight against #KidneyDisease, an affliction that affects 37 million Americans nationwide.

Together, we can make a difference. Learn more about available resources, support, and more at kidneyfund.org/kidney-month.

What a great pleasure it was to host community officials from Stockbridge, Lovejoy, Hampton, Union City, and Riverdale in my Washington office this week!

I extend my heartfelt appreciation for their dedication to improving the lives of #GA13 residents and our communities.

üì¢ Attention college students & recent graduates!

Looking for a summer internship in legislative affairs or public administration?

Apply now to join our team in D.C. or #GA13. Applications are open until Friday, April 21, 2023.

Learn more at davidscott.house.gov/forms/f‚Ä¶

Today, I published an op-ed in @TheHill, where I discussed why defending and protecting the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) in this year‚Äôs farm bill is critical for the well-being of America‚Äôs families.

Read More: thehill.com/policy/future-of‚Ä¶
On #NationalAgDay we celebrate all the farmers, farmworkers, ranchers, fishers, foresters, and other agriculture workers who work day in and day out to make our nation strong, healthy, and fed.

Let's get it done.

mdjonline.com/news/local/rep‚Ä¶

This month, I was proud to introduce a bill in Congress to provide an additional $100 million in funding for 1890 land-grant HBCU scholarships.

Investing in education and supporting underrepresented communities in agriculture is key to a brighter and more inclusive future.

Today on #EqualPayDay, we are reminded of the ongoing fight for pay equity.

I am proud to continue this work in Congress and commit to supporting equal pay, equal access to opportunities, and equal rights for all.

This week, I hosted representatives from the Georgia Association of Broadcasters in my Washington office to discuss how local news and radio play a key role in keeping our Georgia communities up-to-date and informed every day!

Honored to be named Lawmaker of the Year by the @GACreditUnions! I am grateful for the recognition and appreciate the opportunity to work with financial services institutions and their patrons across #GA.

As a member of @FSCDems, I look forward to continuing this important work.

Today, #SCOTUS hears oral arguments for President Biden‚Äôs student debt relief program.

In #GA13 more than 179k constituents would qualify for up to $20,000 in forgiveness. I hope to see a swift ruling that gets this much-needed relief to millions of hard-working Americans.

Approximately 42 million Americans rely on SNAP to maintain nutritionally adequate diets each year.

Now is not the time to make cuts to one of the most important tools we have to increase food and nutrition security in this country. #DefendSNAP
I am deeply saddened at the passing of Tommy Dortch, Jr., a tremendous leader for justice and equality in Atlanta and around the country. My prayers go out to Tommy and his many friends and family.
Read more: davidscott.house.gov/news/do‚Ä¶

This week I sent a letter to the District Attorneys in #GA13 calling for the expanded use of accountability courts in GA. 

By focusing on the individual within the system, accountability courts reduce recidivism rates & facilitate recovery through positive action & mutual trust.
I‚Äôm excited to welcome our new U.S. House Agriculture Committee members. I look forward to continuing our work in the 118th Congress!
This National #BlackHistoryMonth, we recognize and celebrate the many powerful voices and stories of Black American individuals and communities throughout our nation‚Äôs history.

Congratulations to our finalists in the inaugural Congressional App Challenge for #GA13!

This competition was an excellent opportunity for students to engage with their peers and showcase their talents in coding and computer programming.

davidscott.house.gov/news/do‚Ä¶

Many thanks to City of Smyrna, GA Mayor Derek Norton for meeting with me today in Washington ‚Äì what a pleasure it was to host him here in the Capitol!

I look forward to continuing our great work for #GA13 constituents in the #JonquilCity!

Over the years, my office has awarded more than $225,000 in Congressional Black Caucus Scholarships to over 100 exceptional students in #GA13.

Want to become a #CBCScholar? Learn more about scholarship opportunities through the @CBCFInc by visiting cbcfinc.academicworks.com.

Yesterday, I was proud to join @USDANutrition at the first regional nutrition summit to discuss nutrition security and ways Congress support can promote food access and healthy eating for all in the upcoming farm bill.

Today, my staff joined #GA13 constituents in Clayton County for the annual #MLKDay parade.

What a wonderful way to celebrate Dr. King's legacy!

On #MLKDay, we honor the legacy of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. and recommit ourselves to the work of building beloved communities in which freedom and equality prevail.

May Dr. King‚Äôs memory continue to inspire service to others as we strive to ensure a better future for all.

Way to go @GeorgiaFootball! Congratulations on the undefeated season and on winning back-to-back College Football National Championships!
 
#GoDawgs
